Sentencas: In this study, we present a creep analysis for an anode-supported tubular solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Effect of tube radius on creep for an anode supported tubular solid oxide fuel cell: Experimental and finite element simulation

Sentencas: The effects of tube radius on creep and stress are also studied.
Titulo: Effect of tube radius on creep for an anode supported tubular solid oxide fuel cell: Experimental and finite element simulation

Sentencas: The as-sintered residual stress is measured by an X-ray diffraction instrument.
Titulo: Effect of tube radius on creep for an anode supported tubular solid oxide fuel cell: Experimental and finite element simulation

Sentencas: Simulated result is consistent with the measurement data.
Titulo: Effect of tube radius on creep for an anode supported tubular solid oxide fuel cell: Experimental and finite element simulation

Sentencas: The finding shows that the fracture starts in the electrolyte for the big tube radius after 50 000 h because of the mismatch creep properties between SOFC layers.
Titulo: Effect of tube radius on creep for an anode supported tubular solid oxide fuel cell: Experimental and finite element simulation

Sentencas: As tube radius increases, the hoop stress in the electrolyte also increases because the growth of elastic strain is dominant compared with creep relaxation.
Titulo: Effect of tube radius on creep for an anode supported tubular solid oxide fuel cell: Experimental and finite element simulation

Sentencas: Hoop stress in the electrolyte exceeds the tensile strength when the tube radius is larger than 30 mm for our SOFC system.
Titulo: Effect of tube radius on creep for an anode supported tubular solid oxide fuel cell: Experimental and finite element simulation

Sentencas: The tube radius should be designed to be in millimeter level or sub-millimeter level to decrease the growth of hoop stress in the electrolyte and ensure long-term reliability at high temperatures.
Titulo: Effect of tube radius on creep for an anode supported tubular solid oxide fuel cell: Experimental and finite element simulation
